name: Marstopia
description:
NOTE: An HTML5 version is included for ease of access, but Godot's HTML5 export is not particularly stable, and so performance suffers. If you'd like a more stable experience, please download the Windows version.

In this sci-fi city builder, you are tasked with building a colony on Mars. Provide infrastructure, housing, shopping, entertainment, and employment to attract more and more citizens! Unlock more structures to build as you play, and design the coolest Martian city you can imagine! 

... or, at least you will when the game is finished! For now, we really only have a few pieces in place. We adhered to the theme of Moonshot so well that even finishing the game was an overly-ambitious goal, and in a new engine to boot! We will continue working on the project in weeks to come, finishing out the functionality that is missing.
